snippet: The United Nations accord on global arms trade can’t touch Americans’ guns. But it can make it harder for the world’s rogue actors to get them.
abstract: Op-Ed article by policy expert Rachel Stohl urges United States to sign and ratify United Nations treaty regulating international trade in conventional weapons; criticizes those opposed to treaty who mistakenly believe that it would somehow infringe on American gun owners' rights.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations accord on global arms trade can’t touch Americans’ guns. But it can make it harder for the world’s rogue actors to get them.
